short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WhatsApp Privacy Shield steps in as your digital guardian, allowing you to blur your chats and profile information seamlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Privacy Shield for WhatsApp Web: Enhance your privacy on the WhatsApp Web platform with our custom extension. Take control of your messaging experience by hiding messages, images, and your account profile.

Key Features:

Message Privacy:
Blur messages in chat and hide message previews for enhanced privacy.
Explore dark mode and other privacy features.

Media Privacy:
Blur media previews, including images, videos, and stickers.
Keep your media content concealed until you choose to reveal it.

Profile Privacy:
Blur your profile picture for increased anonymity.
Control who sees your profile information.

Customizable Settings:
Tailor the extension to your needs with customizable settings.
Adjust privacy features to meet your preferences.

Hover to Reveal:
Use the hover-to-reveal feature to selectively expose content.

Legal Disclaimer:
Our project operates independently and is not endorsed or affiliated with WhatsApp Inc. WhatsApp is a registered trademark of WhatsApp Inc., recognized in the U.S. and other countries. This extension offers enhanced privacy features for users of the WhatsApp Web platform and is not directly associated with the official application.

Upgrade Your Web Experience:
Download now to keep your messages, images, and profile information safe and secure.

Developer Domain Priority:
Boost your online presence with our developer domain priority feature.(www.webholix.com)

Related Extension Links:
Explore other useful Chrome extensions like:
View Once Plus: Photo Preview on WhatsApp Web
